news.title: DeepFix: Fixing Common C Language Errors by Deep Learning @AAAI'17
news.content:
The following program repair work is presented at Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI) 2017 held in San Francisco, California, USA:

DeepFix: Fixing Common C Language Errors by Deep Learning
R. Gupta, S. Pal, A. Kanade, S. Shevade.

news.title: Dynamic Patch Generation for Null Pointer Exceptions Using Metaprogramming @SANER'17
news.content:
The following program repair work is presented at International Conference on Software Analysis, Evolution and Reengineering (SANER) 2017 held at the Alpen-Adria University Klagenfurt, Austria:

Dynamic Patch Generation for Null Pointer Exceptions Using Metaprogramming
T. Durieux, B. Cornu, L. Seinturier, M. Monperrus.

news.title: ACS — program repair tool for Java
news.content:
ACS is a new program repair tool for Java with accurate condition synthesis:

https://github.com/Adobee/ACS

news.title: Precise Condition Synthesis for Program Repair @ICSE'17
news.content:
The following program repair work is presented at International Conference on Software Engineering 2017 held in Buenos Aires, Argentina:

Precise Condition Synthesis for Program Repair
Y. Xiong, J. Wang, R. Yan, J. Zhang, S. Han, G. Huang, L. Zhang.

news.title: Astor — program repair framework for Java
news.content:
Astor is a new automatic software repair framework for Java (incl. GenProg, Kali and mutation repair for Java):

https://github.com/SpoonLabs/astor

news.title: Sound and Complete Mutation-Based Program Repair @FM'16
news.content:
The following program repair work is presented at International Symposium on Formal Methods 2016 held in Limassol, Cyprus:

Sound and Complete Mutation-Based Program Repair
B. Rothenberg, O. Grumberg.
